replies.user_plane_search_ask_plane_search: I'd like to find a flight
replies.plane_ask_date: On what day do you want the plane to arrive?
replies.user_plane_search_inform_departure_arriv: i want to find a flight between [CITY] to [CITY] on [DATE]
replies.plane_request_optional: I can also filter the results for a specific airline, class, price or duration.
replies.db_plane_inform_flight_details: [RESULT] APIName = plane_search ; Airline = [AIRLINE] ; ArrivalCity = [CITY] ; ArrivalTime = [TIME] ; Class = [CLASS] ; Date = [DATE] ; DepartureCity = [CITY] ; DurationHours = [NUMBER] ; Price = [NUMBER] ; id = [NUMBER] ;
replies.plane_inform_flight_details:
Right, I found {clazz:s} flight with {airline:s} for {price:d} credits
 that takes {duration:d} hours to get to {arrival_city:s}.
replies.plane_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no flights that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.plane_ask_more_questions: Would you like to search for any more flights?
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you search for flights.
